page.title: 02ARTS & CRAFTS:SWANSEA WEST
page.content: In my spare time I like to press flowers.Summertime is best for this craft,there are lovely wild flowers in the hedgerows here.Wild daisies,rose petals and buttercup are nice to press,you must leave them in the press for at least a week.Then I make them into pictures or put them on Christmas cards. Painting is my hobby:I take my pad,brushes and paints onto the Prom. Last year I painted and I won the N.S.P.C.C. Art Competition.My brother builds Lego helicopters and space craft and makes models out of wood.My mother knits,sews and goes to Embroiderers' Guild.My father goes to pottery classes,he makes figures of the characters from "Under Milk Wood".
